title: Suryakanthi Diamond Studs - A Touch of Telugu Tradition
materials: Crafted in 18K Yellow Gold with a radiant
high-clarity (SI) Diamonds. Gold is sourced ethically and meticulously tested for purity.
features: These stunning studs feature a delicate, floral design, reminiscent of the 'Suryakanthi' (Sunflower). The diamonds are meticulously set in a prong setting to maximize their brilliance, with paisley details around the perimeter. The design allows light to penetrate the diamonds, enhancing their sparkle and creating a mesmerizing effect. Comfortable and secure push-back closure.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold contrasting beautifully with the icy white sparkle of the diamonds. A classic and elegant color combination.
occasions: adding a touch of elegance to any outfit. Ideal for special occasions like weddings
or festive celebrations. A thoughtful gift for birthdays
description: These 'Suryakanthi' inspired studs combine traditional South Indian aesthetics with modern jewelry design. The intricate craftsmanship and high-quality diamonds ensure a timeless piece that can be treasured for generations. Easy to wear and maintain, these studs are a perfect blend of style and comfort. Represents positivity and new beginnings, making it a meaningful gift.
